'''Kamera Picture''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Snapshots}}. [[Xu]] gives the player two '''Kamera Pictures''', one of [[Granny Shan]] and another of [[Tea Master Liu Su]], to deliver to them.

Both items have the same name and description, though they show their respective subjects when checking the item's details.
